### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.
- Remove any existing entities at the target position before placing a new entity.

### Errors when connecting entities
- Make sure the entities are compatible and can be connected.
- Ensure the entities are at the correct positions and have the correct connections.

### Errors when accessing entity attributes
- Ensure the entity exists and has the attribute you are trying to access.
- Check the entity's status and connections before accessing its attributes.

### Errors when working with pipe groups
- Ensure the pipe group is connected and has a valid fluid system.
- Check the pipe group's status and fluid box before attempting to access its attributes.

### Errors when working with boilers
- Ensure the boiler has a valid fuel source and is connected to a pipe group.
- Check the boiler's status and warnings before attempting to access its attributes.

### Errors when working with offshore pumps
- Ensure the offshore pump is connected to a pipe group and has a valid fluid system.
- Check the offshore pump's status and warnings before attempting to access its attributes.
